scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin copyright.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/copyright.html && usemin fraude.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/fraude.html && usemin plantillas.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/plantillas.html && usemin precios.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/precios.html && usemin remedio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/remedio.html && usemin tortclaim.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/tortclaim.html && usemin trust.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/trust.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
